definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Road-stays on the highway are holding up traffic.
sentences.chinese: 高速公路上的道路施工阻碍了访问量。

sentences.english: This monument is one of the most visited sites in the city of Washington.
sentences.chinese: 这一纪念碑是为在华盛顿市访问量最大的网站之一。

sentences.english: You can see the same dynamic at work at Sohu, the owner of China's fourth-most-visited website.
sentences.chinese: 中国访问量第四大的网站搜狐也有这样的纠结。

sentences.english: By the end of, like two weeks from now or so, we're going to pass Google in page views.
sentences.chinese: 这样算来，仅需两周，便能超过谷歌的访问量。

sentences.english: But everyday, we get more than 200 million page views.
sentences.chinese: 但是每天的页面访问量都超过两亿。

sentences.english: The man which caemploy the accident finwhichley conceded to the police these he get finiherd it.
sentences.chinese: 造成这次访问量事故的人最终向警察承认他是肇事人。

sentences.english: Why is the time of day dawn the slowest traffic titled rush hwe?
sentences.chinese: 为什么一天中访问量最慢的时刻叫“速行”时刻？

sentences.english: The site received 1.86 million visits the prior week.
sentences.chinese: 而之前一周，网站则收获了186万的访问量。

sentences.english: And we do a lot of page views.
But server logs themselves are subject to inaccuracies.
sentences.chinese: 但服务器访问量方法本身就是不准确的。

sentences.english: He said he got tens of thousands of extra clicks.
sentences.chinese: 他说他的网站因此得到数以万计的访问量。

definition: number of clicks/number of hits (on a website)
sum or volume of business transactions/turnover
to crash (of a computer)/Taiwanese term for 當機|当机[dang4 ji1]
